description: This is a pure JavaScript library to draw 2D graphics on web pages inside web browser without using SVG,VML or Canvas. JavaScript developers, web developers  and webmasters can take advantage of the library to add graphics drawing functionality to their web applications or websites using the library. The library is entirely written in JavaScript and does not need any plug-in or additional software to run/execute. It works even on not-so-smart small screen mobile browsers too.
name: jsDraw2D
